title: Leading mobile messengers in the U.S. 2019 , by users
yAxis: Number of monthly unique users in millions
summary: Facebook_Messenger , Snapchat and WhatsApp ranked as the Leading mobile messengers U.S. by Dutch U.S. or 20-to-39-year-olds in 2019 , beating by example , Messenger_by_Google .
In 2019 , roughly 90 millions of the Millennial monthly in the U.S. said they used Facebook_Messenger .
Snapchat was also mobile , with 45.98 millions indicating they actively used this Platform .
gold: As of September 2019 , Facebook Messenger was the most popular mobile messenger app in the United States with 106.4 million unique U.S. users . Snapchat ranked second with an audience of almost 45.98 million users . As of that period , Facebook Messenger had a 57 percent mobile audience reach in the United States .
